thread.title: Linkin Park To Release 'Intense, Violent' Video For New Song 'Heavy' [News]
thread.title_full: Linkin Park To Release 'Intense, Violent' Video For New Song 'Heavy' [News]

title: Linkin Park To Release 'Intense, Violent' Video For New Song 'Heavy' [News]
text:
Linkin Park to Release 'Intense, Violent' Video for New Song 'Heavy' "What's funny is, like, this song is, like, not a heavy song," Chester Bennington says. UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 6 hours ago 3 
Chester Bennington announced that Linkin Park is gearing up to release an intense video for their latest single " Heavy ." 
The singer told Music Choice : "What's funny is, like, this song is, like, not a heavy song, but I destroyed more stuff making [a video for] this song than, like, any other song. It was more violent and more intense making this video than any other video. Like, I got into like fistfights with myself, fistfights with other people, breaking a bunch of stuff. 
"I got to take a lamp and throw it through a television set. Like, I've wrecked so much stuff, it was awesome."Stay tuned.
